EmailTemplate.description: Growing demand with link to offer
EmailTemplate.name: Fortune WiW 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up to my voicemail - Are you a Woman in Wealth?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
I am following up on the voicemail I left you regarding the special feature we are running in Fortune magazine highlighting the growing demand for women in the wealth management industry.
Click here more information on this special section.
I look forward to talking to you soon!
Thank you,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} Account Manager Five Star Professional {!Contact.OwnerPhone} {!Contact.OwnerEmail} www.fivestarprofessional.com
